select R.ID, R.ApprovedBy, AD.IsRFCUpdate, R.AttendenceDate, AD.StatusID,R.New_StatusID from RFCEntry as R
inner join Attendance_Dates as AD on AD.Date=R.AttendenceDate
inner join Attendance as a on a.AID=AD.AID and a.Isdeleted=0 and a.EMPID=R.EMPID
where R.Approved=1 and a.Month=6 and AD.StatusID!=R.New_StatusID and R.Isdeleted=0


declare @IDs varchar(max)

set @IDs='18453,18473,18669,18491,18438,18440,18560,18512,18437,18457,18545,18443,18887,18503,18581,18464,18972,18469,18680,18971,18495,18506,18854,18670,18507,18868,18886,18515,18482,18520,18539,18492,18546,18504,18480,19256,18537,19116,18857,18671,18627,18553,18554,18917,18540,18548,19257,18531,18973,18969,18712,18593,18612,18737,18609,18603,18618,18745,18708,18682,18636,19260,18678,18663,18858,18738,18847,18635,18631,18659,19108,19018,18742,18751,18831,18845,18855,19109,18781,18734,18902,18905,18747,18976,18796,18832,18911,18967,18833,18980,18846,18884,18856,18964,18852,18903,18987,18888,18838,18872,18912,19261,19117,18924,18928,18918,19062,18942,18925,18939,18975,18934,18970,19262,18989,19023,19041,19061,19040,19003,20559,19263,19080,19057,19067,19088,19085,19156,19151,19119,19147,19159,19137,19127,19128,19264,19213,19183,19164,19195,19201,19405,19184,19191,20535,19211,19311,19407,18760,18646,19158,19084,18870,18860,19130,18919,18957,19012,18566,18547,19406,18583,18937,18960,19267,20536,19198,18681,18684';

exec spu_SetRFCApproved @IDs,1,'',1,''
